name: AstralRush
description:
In a world...

of futuristsic neon cities, Astralos is on his most important mission yet; he must return his girlfriend's katana that she forgot at his place.

Rush through the illuminated streets in the most speedy shopping cart you will ever see to reunite with Cutlana, but be careful as danger lies ahead.

Will you beat the game, or will the game beat you?
